description: Enrollment Analytics Scoring Configuration for Cloud Journey Dashboard

velocity.description: Weight for enrollment velocity score (0-100). Higher velocity = better momentum.

successRate.description: Weight for enrollment success rate. Measures completions vs failures.

complexity.description: Weight for remaining complexity (inverse score - less complexity = higher score).

infrastructure.description: Weight for infrastructure readiness (connectors, policies, hybrid join).

conditionalAccess.description: Weight for Conditional Access policy coverage.

velocityThresholds.description: Thresholds for classifying enrollment velocity as excellent/good/fair/poor.

excellent.description: Devices per week to be considered excellent velocity.

good.description: Devices per week to be considered good velocity.

fair.description: Devices per week to be considered fair velocity.

poor.description: Below this is considered poor velocity.

stallDetection.description: Configuration for detecting enrollment stalls and Trust Trough risk.

trustTroughLowerBound.description: Lower bound of the Trust Trough zone (percentage).

trustTroughUpperBound.description: Upper bound of the Trust Trough zone (percentage).

stallThresholdDays.description: Days without significant enrollment progress to trigger stall warning.

significantProgressThreshold.description: Minimum devices enrolled to be considered significant progress.

confidenceBands.description: Score ranges for confidence level classifications.

batchConfiguration.description: Settings for generating low-risk enrollment batches.

minBatchSize.description: Minimum devices to include in a batch.

maxBatchSize.description: Maximum devices to include in a batch.

preferredComplexityScore.description: Maximum complexity score for devices to be included in low-risk batches.

minReadinessScore.description: Minimum readiness score for devices to be included in low-risk batches.

playbookGeneration.description: Settings for auto-generating playbooks based on current state.

enableAutogeneration.description: Whether to automatically generate playbooks based on analytics.

maxPlaybooksPerType.description: Maximum number of playbooks to generate per type (enrollment, hygiene, etc.).

prioritizeByRisk.description: Whether to prioritize low-risk playbooks in the list.

hashDeviceNames.description: Whether to hash device names in telemetry (recommended: true).

includeTimestamps.description: Whether to include timestamps in telemetry events.

eventPrefix.description: Prefix for all enrollment analytics telemetry events.

chartConfiguration.description: Settings for velocity trend chart visualization.

weeksToDisplay.description: Number of weeks to show in the velocity trend chart.

showTargetLine.description: Whether to show the target velocity line on the chart.

targetVelocityMultiplier.description: Multiplier for calculating target velocity (1.2 = 20% above current average).

refreshIntervals.description: How often to refresh various data points (in minutes).

confidenceScore.description: Refresh interval for confidence score calculation.
